00019 struct FastCaliceHitMemoryPool {
00020   ~FastCaliceHitMemoryPool();
00021   std::vector<void*> mempool;
00022 };
00023 
00024 extern FastCaliceHitMemoryPool theFCHMemPool;

00026 
00036 class FastCaliceHit : public IMPL::RawCalorimeterHitImpl {
00037 
00038 public: 
00039 
00040 // at least in gcc we can work around the aliasing problems with this union
00041   union flt_or_int {
00042     int i;
00043     float f;
00044   };
00045 
00046   FastCaliceHit() {};
00047   
00048   inline FastCaliceHit(unsigned short moduleID, unsigned short chip, unsigned short channel, float valueEnergy,
00049                 float errorEnergy, int timeStamp) {
00050     
00051     _timeStamp = timeStamp;
00052     _hti = HcalTileIndex( moduleID, chip, channel );
00053     _cellID0 = _hti.getIndex();
00054     /*  (moduleID << 16) | 
00055         ((chip & 0x00FF) << 8) |
00056         (channel & 0x00FF);   */
00057     flt_or_int t;
00058     t.f = valueEnergy;
00059     _amplitude = t.i;
00060     t.f = errorEnergy;
00061     _cellID1 = t.i;
00062   };
00063   
00064   inline FastCaliceHit(int cellID, float valueEnergy, float errorEnergy, int timeStamp) {
00065     
00066     _timeStamp = timeStamp;
00067     _cellID0 = cellID;
00068     _hti = HcalTileIndex( _cellID0 );
00069     flt_or_int t;
00070     t.f = valueEnergy;
00071     _amplitude = t.i;
00072     t.f = errorEnergy;
00073     _cellID1 = t.i;
00074   };
00075   
00076   inline FastCaliceHit(RawCalorimeterHit* aRawCalorimeterHit) {
00077     _timeStamp = aRawCalorimeterHit->getTimeStamp();
00078     _cellID0 = aRawCalorimeterHit->getCellID0();
00079     _hti = HcalTileIndex( _cellID0 );
00080     _amplitude = aRawCalorimeterHit->getAmplitude();
00081     _cellID1 = aRawCalorimeterHit->getCellID1();
00082   };
00083  
00084   inline void* operator new( size_t size )
00085   {
00086     // fixme: set lock to be threadsafe
00087     // fixme: handle "out of memory" correctly
00088     void * memory;
00089     size_t poolsize = theFCHMemPool.mempool.size();
00090     if ( poolsize == 0 )
00091       {
00092       memory = malloc( size );
00093       }
00094     else
00095       {
00096       memory = theFCHMemPool.mempool[ poolsize-1 ];
00097       theFCHMemPool.mempool.pop_back();
00098       }
00099     return memory;
00100   };
00101 
00102   inline void operator delete(void* mem)
00103   {
00104     theFCHMemPool.mempool.push_back(mem);
00105   };  
00106 
00109   inline unsigned short getModule() const {
00110     return _hti.getModule();
00111   }
00112 
00115   inline unsigned short getModuleID() const {
00116     int oldModuleID = ( getModule() << 8 ) | getModuleType();
00117     return oldModuleID;
00118   };
00119 
00122   inline unsigned short getModuleType() const {
00123     return _hti.getModuleType();
00124   }
00125 
00128   inline unsigned short getChip() const {
00129     return _hti.getChip();
00130   };
00131   
00134   inline unsigned short getChannel() const {
00135     return _hti.getChannel();
00136   };
00137   
00140   inline unsigned short getCellKey() const {
00141     return (unsigned short) ((getChip() << 8) | getChannel());
00142   };
00143 
00144   
00147   inline int getCellID() const {
00148     return (int) _cellID0;
00149   };
00150   
00153   inline float getEnergyValue() const {
00154     flt_or_int t;
00155     t.i = _amplitude;
00156     return t.f;
00157   };
00158   
00161   inline float getEnergyError() const {
00162     flt_or_int t;
00163     t.i = _cellID1;
00164     return t.f;
00165   };
00166   
00169   inline int getTimeStamp() const {
00170     return _timeStamp;
00171   };
00172   
00175   inline void setEnergyValue(float energyValue) {
00176     flt_or_int t;
00177     t.f = energyValue;
00178     _amplitude = t.i;
00179   };
00180   
00183   inline void setEnergyError(float energyError) {
00184     flt_or_int t;
00185     t.f = energyError;
00186     _cellID1 = t.i;
00187   };
00188   
00191   inline void setTimeStamp(unsigned timeStamp) {
00192     _timeStamp = timeStamp;
00193   };
00194   
00197   void print(std::ostream& os);
00198 
00199  protected:
00200   HcalTileIndex _hti;
00201 
00202 };
